title: I have iver 110 ping on normal servers and slightly below 70 ping on the pbe
body: I had average 50 ping in March of 2013 and now I'm double from that, what do I do to lower my ping again?

replies.body:
> Move.

"Honey, we're moving to California!"
"But dear, your job is here, and we can't really afford to move right n-"
"WOMAN WE'RE MOVING, I NEED LOW PING IN LEAGUE OF LEGENDS"
its riot's servers cause I used to have like 140 ping but now my ping is 110
